name: 4 Day Ausangate Trek And Machu Picchu Tour
description: This tour is recommended for nature lovers and those who enjoy trekking off the beaten path. This trek will take you through high mountain passes and traditional Andean villages. If you are up for a challenging trek and a once in a lifetime cultural experience, you will love this trek. You will experience new breathtaking remote areas combined with a classic train ride to Machu Picchu.
